Workflow.Name: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Risk Rating
Workflow.Description: For AvSec Risks this triggers from an update that happens in the [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Check for updated Risk Score flow. What it does is look for a Risk Rating based on what Risk Score is set for the Operation Activity Risk Score.

LocalizedName.description: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Risk Rating

Description.description: For AvSec Risks this triggers from an update that happens in the [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Check for updated Risk Score flow. What it does is look for a Risk Rating based on what Risk Score is set for the Operation Activity Risk Score.
